feature.label: EMC Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet Driver
feature.description: This feature provides the Epsilon Model Connectivity driver for Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet models. This driver is required in order to work with Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet models in Epsilon.
